resources.string: Welcome to Nasa image of the day search!
Click to open the HD image!
Enter or change your name and save it for future usage.
Select a date, and load the image to view it along with the URL and hd url.\nFavorite the image to add it to your favorites list.
Select an item from the list to view more information about it, and press delete to delete it from your favorites.
Enjoy viewing random images from your favorites list on a 10 second timer.
